channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tilray’s stock slumps as cannabis and beer maker plans to cut its drinks lineup
item.description: The beer and cannabis company’s revenue fell short of analyst estimates.

item.title: Los Angeles rents could rise by up to 12% because of the wildfires, experts say
item.description: Rents in L.A. were going down, but the wildfires could reverse that trend.

item.title: Gold Rises After Strong U.S. Jobs Data
item.description: Gold prices gained further amid uncertainties over the impact of future U.S. policy on the economy and inflation, even after the latest jobs report su...

item.title: Walgreens’ stock could see its best day ever. Is a turnaround really in store?
item.description: Walgreens was the worst stock in the S&P 500 last year. An analyst writes that it’s still “premature to say that Walgreens is on a stable path to grow...

item.title: California wildfires send power company Edison International’s stock falling
item.description: The company will likely face questions over whether any of its power lines may have contributed to the fires. No officials have made any statements on...

item.title: Trump's Potential Top Banking Regulators Tease Lighter Regulatory Touch
item.description: FDIC Vice Chairman Travis Hill will call for no change in capital requirements for the largest banks in his Friday speech.

item.title: Consumer expectations for higher inflation soar in early January
item.description: Americans’ expectations for overall inflation over the next year jumped to 3.3% in January from 2.8% in the prior month, according to the University o...

item.title: Dow Falls, Bond Yields Jump After Strong Payrolls Data
item.description: Stocks opened lower as investors assessed a blockbuster jobs report that makes future interest-rate cuts seem less likely.

item.title: How You Can See Through Wall Street's Ritual of Wrong
item.description: Analysts and market strategists love to predict what markets will do in the year ahead. Don’t let this misguided ritual blind you to what assets are r...

item.title: Constellation Energy Agrees to Buy Calpine for $16.4 Billion
item.description: The merger combines two of the country’s largest power generators as demand for electricity surges.
